name: Keyvolve
description:
Keyvolve is a game where you guide our keyboard friend (known as Keith the Keyboard) through various puzzles. Keith starts with very few keys on them in the beginning of the game, but they can evolve by grabbing more keys scattered around the levels throughout their journey. It's your role to help them expand their arsenal with these new keys, overcome the puzzles that lie ahead, and fulfill their destiny of keyboard evolution.

Keyvolve was made as an entry for the Go Godot Game Jam 3 competition.
